alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 25 at 3:46PM CDT until October 25 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Comanche, Eastland, Erath and Palo Pinto counties. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stephenville, Dublin, De Leon, Gorman, Gordon, Palo Pinto, Huckabay, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Lake Palo Pinto, Morgan Mill, Strawn, Mingus, New Salem, Comyn, Hannibal, Thurber, Lingleville, Patillo, Desdemona and Santo.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
